subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Greg Biffle scored his first victory of the season Sunday — even though he ran out of gas before crossing the finish line — in a wild race that jumbled the standings in the Chase.
snippet: Greg Biffle scored his first victory of the season Sunday — even though he ran out of gas before crossing the finish line — in a wild race that jumbled the standings in the Chase.
